explanations.A: If we are skip counting in 100s, the next number will be 200 + 100 = 300. Which number here can we not get to by adding hundreds on to 200?
explanations.B: If we are skip counting up from 200, the numbers will never get smaller than 200, so we will never say 100.
explanations.C: If we keep skip counting in 100s, after 900 we will reach 1000! Which number can we not get to by counting in 100s from 200?
explanations.D: If we keep skip counting 300, 400, 500... we will reach 800. Which number can we not get to by counting in 100s from 200?
